course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website is for a 'Best MBA College' offering 'PGDM (MBA) Programmes' with an overwhelming focus on management, industry interface, corporate placements, and business-related skills and careers in sectors like FMCG, e-commerce, finance, and advertising. Mentions of 'Business Analytics' and 'Data Visualization through Tableau & Power Bi' are for business insights, not software development. All student testimonials highlight careers in sales, marketing, finance, HR, and general management roles.

contacts.title: Training and Placement Officer (TPO) / Placement Cell

metadata.institution_name: NDIM - New Delhi Institute of Management
